body.p: 1. One of Javan’s four sons and a descendant of Noah through Japheth’s line (1 Chr 1:7).
2. Sixth of Bilhan’s seven sons. He was a capable leader in Benjamin’s tribe and numbered among those able to go to war (1 Chr 7:10).
3. One of the seven princes of Persia and Media. These men had personal access to King Ahasuerus’s presence and positions of honor second only to the king himself (Est 1:14).
